title: Ice Knife
content:
nife Information

Description: Throw a shard of ice that deals 1∼10 Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2∼12 Cold damage to anyone nearby creating an ice surface. This spell can be cast while you are Silenced. Level: Lv 1 Spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: 2 Turns Range: 2m18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save
